item.title: Grunt power : developing and releasing your web app has never been so easy
item.description: Abstract Grunt is a very (very) powerful tool to automate your JavaScript webapp development and release tasks. During a step by step live demo, I will present how to use this tool and why this is a must have in every front-end developers toolbox. During live demos, we will see how to use Grunt to : start a local server to run your application watch for code or style modifications (live reload) compile SASS/LESS files to regular CSS concatenate and minify JavaScript files check for JavaScript errors against our pre-defined standard (thanks to JSHint) add copyright headers to files run unit tests and end-to-end tests deploy the app to your integration servers
